text: The Panama national Under-20 football team is the national U-20 team of Panama. The U-20 team is currently coached by Leonardo Pipino. They have made six FIFA U-20 World Cup appearances. Their best results was Round of 16 in 2019. ==Technical Staff== * Head Coach: Vacant ==Current squad== The following players were selected to take part in the 2019 FIFA U-20 World Cup. Head coach: Vacant ==Historical list of coaches== * 2002-2003 Gary Stempel * 2004-2005 René Mendieta * 2006-2007 Julio Dely Valdés * 2008-2009 Cristóbal Maldonado * 2010-2011 Jorge Dely Valdés * 2011–2013 José Alfredo Poyatos * 2013-2014 Javier Wanchope * 2014–2017 Leonardo Pipino * 2017–2018 Nelson Gallego * 2018-2019 Jorge Dely Valdés * 2019-2020 Julio Dely Valdes ==See also== * Panama national football team * Panama national under-17 football team ==References== ==External links== * Under-20 Category:Central American national under-20 association football teams
title: Panama national under-20 football team
